metadata.name: My Little Friend - Crying
metadata.description:
1 of a series of GIFs exploring the different emotions & life states of My Little Friend.

My Little Friend is a virtual character created by artist Ben Elliot. Agender, non-animal, nor human, its personality epitomises the cute and innovative aspects of the new generations.
Conceived as a long-term and multi-faceted art project, My Little Friend's first implementations involve a face filter as well as several programs in virtual & augmented reality, GIFs & more.
